titleStmt.title: Funerall elegies. Or The sad muses in sables, singing the Epicediums of his Highness Prince Maurice, Count Palatine of the Rhine, Duke of Bavaria, &c. James Duke of Lenox and Richmond. Iohn Earl of Rivers. Iohn Cleveland, the much-cry'd up poet. / Written by S.H.
titleStmt.author: S. H.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Wilson at the Three Foxes in Long-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
